data.text: Of Milford, NH, formerly of Charlestown, December 15, Jean Marie (Sutherlin). Beloved wife of Frank Prevost. Devoted daughter of Lois (Fleming) and the late James Sutherlin of Charlestown. Loving sister of James Sutherlin and his wife Elaine of Woburn, and Robert Sutherlin and his partner Robert Carrigg of Somerville. Adored aunt of Jiliane and Bryan Sutherlin, both of Woburn. Also survived by many aunts, uncles and cousins. Visiting hours in the John H. Sawyer Funeral Home, 329 Bunker Hill St., CHARLESTOWN, on Wednesday, December 20, 8:00-11:00 A.M., followed by a Funeral Mass in St. Francis de Sales Church, Charlestown, at 12 noon. Relatives and friends invited. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery, Malden. In lieu of flowers, remembrances in Jean Marie’s name may be made to the Dana Farber Cancer Institute, 44 Binney St., Boston, MA, 02115; or the Community Hospice House, 221 Naticook Rd., Merrimack, NH, 03054. Parking area opposite Funeral Home.
